description: JurisPro provides a free directory of expert witnesses in over 10,000 areas of expertise.

cases.title: General Surgery Expert Witness Not Allowed to Testify in Wrongful Death Case
cases.description: A General Surgery Expert Witness was not allowed to testify because his training was in general medicine and not internal medicine.

cases.title: Allergies & Immunology Expert Witness Testimony Not Allowed in Allergic Reaction Case
cases.description: Allergies & Immunology Expert Witness was not qualified to opine on the standard of care of a pharmacist in prescribing antibiotics.

cases.title: Marine Engineering Expert Witness Testimony Limited in Asbestos Case
cases.description: Marine Engineering Expert Witness could testify on procurement of items used on ships, but could not opine on the duty to warn of asbestos.

cases.title: Business Valuation Expert Witness Allowed to Testify in Benefits Claim Case
cases.description: Business Valuation Expert Witness could testify despite not being certified in financial forensics.
